title: Login Trouble
body: I'm in South Korea but my account is on NA Region; when I try to login it says authenticating and then "Unable to connect to the login queue". I've tried all of the troubleshooting guides and utilized the Hextech Repair Tool. They haven't worked so far, could this be a regional issue or is it something on my half?

replies.body: I appreciate everyone helping each other out here, it's really great to see!  At this point everything should be okay now!  If you're still running into issues, though, be sure to hit up our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to review your specific issue directly.

You should still be able to reach our authentication servers, though you're likely to experience some higher ping in-game.  If you can't login, there might be a block getting in the way though it sucks the connection guide hasn't helped.  In that case, grab the logs provided by the HRT, and reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look and help you directly with this.
Thank you all for the help, it seemed to have resolved itself in time and I hope everyone else having the same issue can work theirs out too :)
It's all good now. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
it's a dns error, they just fixed it for the most part on OCE but that doesn't help me log into NA and it looks like it's affecting a lot of international players.
So if it is a DNS error, and I am currently in Singapore, does this mean I am unable to play until the next patch? Or is there something I can do?

Basically the new patch got blocked out by a few dns checkpoints, it's an easy fix for local servers but NA is super big and I don't know if they'll fix it anytime soon. But it's not a problem with Riot's servers it's with the DNS providers. So it's basically a matter of waiting, the most infuriating thing.
Ah, I see... So I guess it's a waiting game then. Oh well...{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
I've got the same problem here in the Philippines. Tried both NA and OCE with the same result.
got the same probleme, also in phillippines....
yep, im in the Philippines and i also got the same problem, cant login but last night before Kayn came out i was able to play games, riot whats happening??
I am experiencing the same issue from Malaysia.

HERE IS SOLUTION

I am in Hong Kong and experiencing the same issue from morning. However, as someone points out, this is a DNS problem. Thus, I follow the instructions on this page https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#mq6, more specifically for mac:

Click the Apple icon on the top left of the screen and choose "System Preferences..."
Double-click "Network"
Select the active connection on the left, and click the "Advanced..." button in the lower right hand corner
Click "DNS" from the selection bar.
Remove any current DNS entries, and input the following public DNS servers:
8.8.8.8
8.8.4.4
Save your changes by selecting "OK"
Apply the changes by clicking "Apply" in the lower right hand corner

And my problem has been solved, please vote this up if it delivers.
I am having trouble in Japan connecting to the login queue too

I have heard there's huge power outage in Toronto, but don't know if it related to the Riot at all
